artist: Woodcutter: Unknown Chinese; Publisher: Giulio Aleni
description: scene of St. John the Baptist standing in front of tree, preaching to crowd; two women seated at LRC, one feeding baby; seated woman holding two children at LLC; medieval clothing; western architecture at top half of image with seven small groups of people, possibly in military formation; eight Chinese characters throughout image
portfolio: From Plate from Giulio Aleni's "Tianzhu jiangsheng zhuxiang jingjie" (An Illustrated History of the Lord of Heaven Who Became Incarnate in the Flesh), Jinjiang Church, Fujian Province, China, 1637
title: Saint John the Baptist Preaching, plate from Giulio Aleni's "Tianzhu jiangsheng zhuxiang jingjie" (An Illustrated History of the Lord of Heaven Who Became Incarnate in the Flesh), Jinjiang Church, Fujian Province, China
